author: striker
msg: First step in adding dynamic locking to sms. The framework now starts

author: dreid
msg: This adds another somewhat drastic debugging mode, but it has already
found a problem in the ongoing work to get pools as sms working correctly.
Essentially it should only be used if all else has failed as it records
a lot of information to a file.

author: trawick
msg: set the int interprocess lock handle to -1 at init in case
this helps keep straight what the caller of apr_os_lock_get()
